data.question: What is a socket?
data.answer: Socket is a combination of port + ip + protocol. Sockets allow communication between two processes on the same or different hosts that are connected by internet.

data.question: How many IPS are there is 10.28.0.0/16 CIDR?
data.answer: This will be 2^32-16 IP which is 2^16 = 65536

data.question: Can DNS work on tcp?
data.answer: Yes, but it will be slow which is not expection from dns.

data.question: Keep a watch we will keep posting more questions here.
